theme.description: A precision-focused, trustworthy, and clean aesthetic designed for financial clarity. High contrast data against subtle, structured backgrounds.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Card titles

data.usage: All currency values, percentages, and tabular data

usage_rules: Use Primary (Deep Navy) for main actions and heavy text.
Use JetBrains Mono for ANY number that affects money.
Use specific color coding for financial status: Green (Profit), Orange (Cost/Overhead), Blue (Revenue).

visual_enhancers.description: Expose the skeleton. Use 'border-collapse' style layouts for data density.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise on the sidebar or header to reduce sterility.

estimator_page.structure: Top: Global Config (Margins/Overheads) -> Sticky. Bottom: Resource Grid.
estimator_page.visuals: The 'Estimator' should look like a high-end spreadsheet, not a basic HTML table.

components.name: EstimatorGrid
components.description: The core calculator table. Must support inline editing.
components.styling: Table cells should have 'focus-within' states. Use tabular-nums.

components.name: ProfitMarginSlider
components.description: Interactive slider to adjust profit margin % and see real-time impact on selling price.
components.styling: Custom range slider with a tooltip showing the calculated value.

components.name: CostSummaryCard
components.styling: Big font (text-4xl) for numbers. Subtle trend indicator.

components.name: ResourceRow
components.description: A row in the estimator for adding a resource.
components.styling: Includes 'Onsite' toggle switch with plane icon animation.

motion.data_updates: Numbers should animate (count up) when recalculating totals.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; }.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Shadcn UI components first (Button, Input, Select, Table, Card, Switch, Slider, Dialog).
3. Create the 'Estimator' page as the heart of the app. It needs to feel responsive and fast.
4. Use 'recharts' for the Cost Breakdown visuals (Pie/Bar charts).
5. Ensure the 'Onsite' toggle significantly changes the row visual (maybe adds a plane icon or changes bg color slightly) to denote travel costs are applied.
